## Changelog

#### 0.6.0 - 2016/03/26
** Swift update release, including:**

- Swift 2.2 support

#### 0.5.0 - 2015/10/22
** Swift update release, including:**

- Swift 2.0 support (harenbrs)
- Carthage support (armadsen)

#### 0.4.2 - 2015/03/11
**Initial release, including:**

- Swift 1.2 support
- CocoaPods support
